long_description: With a low-profile fit and high-profile color and reflectivity, the Amphipod Go Girl Xinglet for women provides up to 40% more reflective area than a standard running vest. Pink shoulder and waist straps with reflective stripes provide 360deg coverage for cyclists, joggers and walkers in low light. Central front and rear reflective zones further enhance visibility. Fully adjustable straps with stretch material and Swift Clip(TM) buckles allow you to easily customize the fit.
short_description: With a low-profile fit and high-profile color and reflectivity, the Amphipod Go Girl Xinglet for women provides up to 40% more reflective area than a standard running vest.
